医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
开发的新设备可非侵入性分解肾结石A team from the Universitat Politècnica de València (UPV) and the Spanish National Research Council (CSIC), belonging to the Research Institute for Molecular Imaging Technologies (I3M), has developed, together with the NITIUV Group of the La Fe Health Research Institute (IIS La Fe) in Valencia and the Biomechanics Institute of Valencia, a new device - in the prototype phase - to break up kidney stones. https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/new-device-developed to-non-invasively-bureb up-up-up-kidney-stones.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/new-device-developed to-non-invasively-bureb up-up-up-kidney-stones.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A6A5D5B0-8207-4F38-B6CE-EA693AC24297 Wed, 12 Mar 2025 12:13:45 -0400 New device developed to non-invasively break up kidney stones
腰围比比BMI更准确地检测儿童肥胖症一项新研究显示，体重指数（BMI）将儿童分类为超重的可能性几乎是腰围对高比率的三倍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/waist-to-height-ratio-more-accurate-than-bmi-for-detectecting-childhood-childhood-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/waist-to-height-ratio-more-accurate-than-tan-bmi-for-detectecting-childhood-childhood-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4DBDC671-1825-43B6-BBA3-5B491D304676 Wed, 12 Mar 2025 10:32:42 -0400 Waist-to-height ratio more accurate than BMI for detecting childhood obesity
通过AI使复杂的细胞培养变得容易有效分子设备的CellXpress AI简化了细胞培养过程，通过高级自动化降低了人体错误并提高了药物发现的效率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/making-complex-cell-cell-culture-culture-culture-culture-asy-and-east-with-with-ai.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/making-complex-cell-cell-cell-culture-culture-culture-asy-and-easy-and-felcited-with-ai.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=64542806-e1da-4B89-8738-9D66D66DFB43225 Wed, 12 Mar 2025 10:24:00 -0400 Making Complex Cell Culture Easy and Efficient with AI
限制电视时间可能会降低患有糖尿病遗传风险的人的心脏病风险根据《美国心脏协会》杂志上发表的新研究，每天观看不超过一小时的电视，每天不超过一小时的电视降低患有不同遗传糖尿病的遗传风险（包括高遗传风险）的人中的心脏病发作，中风和其他血管疾病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/limiting-tv time-may-reduce-hend-disease-hend-disease-risk-for-for-for-people-with-with-with-genetic-for-for-for-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/limiting-tv time-may-reduce-hend-disease-disease-risk-for-for-for-people-with-ginetic-with-genetic-for-for-for-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A01991C9-4CBF-4CC0-9299-3EA72AF4F96B Wed, 12 Mar 2025 09:18:07 -0400 Limiting TV time may reduce heart disease risk for people with genetic risk for diabetes
靶向α疗法为治疗转移性黑色素瘤提供了新的希望转移性黑色素瘤，也称为IV期黑色素瘤，是一种扩散到人体其他部位的皮肤癌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/targeted-alpha-therapy-offers-new-hope-for--for-treating-metancastatic-melanoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/targeted-alpha-therapy-offers-new-hope-for--for-port--for--for-metancastatic-melanoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3A90C40E-4392-4FC2-98C0-27A6EC9FCCB5 Wed, 12 Mar 2025 09:10:04 -0400 Targeted alpha therapy offers new hope for treating metastatic melanoma
WHO推荐的流感疫苗菌株的最新信息（2025-2026北半球）为了维持疫苗功效，他们定期根据全球流行病学，病毒学和血清学分析更新流感疫苗菌株。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/updates-on-influenza-vaccine-strain-recmorned-who-who-（2025-2025-2026-2026-Northern-Northern-horthern-Horthern-Hemisphere).aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/updates-on-influenza-vaccine-strain-strain-recommend-by-who-who-（2025-2025-2026-NORTERNENN-NORTHERNERNERN-HORTORNERN-HORTORNERN-HORTORNERN-HERTORNERN-HEMISPHERE） https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=55558DD20-C9A9-4C84-884-882A-FD267323ECD9 Wed, 12 Mar 2025 08:03:00 -0400 Updates on influenza vaccine strain recommended by WHO (2025-2026 northern hemisphere)
吉利德（Gilead）的Capsid Revolution符合我们的Capsid解决方案：中国生物学 - 工程工具以超越艾滋病毒吉利德科学（Gilead Sciences）宣布了一个重大的里程碑：美国FDA接受了其新药应用（NDAS），用于Lenacapavir（Len），这是一种每年两次可注射的HIV-1可注射HIV-1 CAPSID抑制剂，用于预防前预防（PREP）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/gileade28099s-capsid-revolution-revolution-meets-recid-meets-our-capsid-soliness-sino-biological-e28093- weendineering the-the-the-the-the-the-tools-tools-tools-to-to-outsmart-hiv.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/gileade28099s-capsid-revolution-revolution-meets-our-capsid-solutions-sino-biological-e28093- weendineering-ewendering-the-the-took-tools-tools-tools-to-to-outsmart-hiv.asmart-hiv.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=29438043-9AC4-404C-A5C3-2B76AC403750 Wed, 12 Mar 2025 08:02:00 -0400 Gilead’s capsid revolution meets our capsid solutions: Sino Biological – Engineering the tools to outsmart HIV
新的可生物降解粘合剂提供更安全的膝关节修复替代方案台湾台北医科大学的Jia-Lin教授的研究团队开发了一种先进的可生物降解的组织粘合剂来修复膝盖弯面术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/new-biodegradable-gadhesive-offers-safer-anternative-for-knee-meniscus-repair.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/new-biodegradable-gadhesive-offers-safer-anternative-for-knee-knee-meniscus-repair.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5959523c-3de1-41f0-a0dc-6f9dbe9e6542 Wed, 12 Mar 2025 08:02:00 -0400 New biodegradable adhesive offers safer alternative for knee meniscus repair
大量月经出血可能会导致中年妇女的疲劳多种更年期症状会使女性感到疲劳。热闪烁，睡眠问题，疼痛和抑郁症只是少数。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/heavy-menstrual-bleeding-may-contribute-to-fatigue-fatigue-in-ridlife-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/heavy-menstrual-bleeding-may-contribute-to-fatigue-fatigue-in-midlife-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d8902aef-1f3c-1f91-A58B-58B-5EE3EF0AC977 Wed, 12 Mar 2025 07:54:47 -0400 Heavy menstrual bleeding may contribute to fatigue in midlife women
HPV癌症筛查和预防疾病患者的差距在《柳叶刀艾滋病毒》上发表的一项新研究揭示了有关预防HPV相关的癌症的知识差距，并概述了未来的研究重点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/gaps-in-hpv-cancer-screening-and-screening-and-prevention-for-prevential-for-people-people-living-hiv.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/gaps-in-hpv-cancer-screening-and-screening-and-prevention-driven-for-for-people-people-living-with-hiv.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d64dadad-847a-464d-8031-0bee11f77e5a Wed, 12 Mar 2025 07:41:57 -0400 Gaps in HPV cancer screening and prevention identified for people living with HIV
